name: ibm-security-guardium-insights
label: IBM Security Guardium Insights
description: IBM Security Guardium Insights is a data security platform that provides real-time monitoring, analysis, and protection for sensitive information across hybrid cloud environments. It helps organizations identify and prioritize potential threats, ensuring data privacy and compliance by detecting unusual activities and vulnerabilities. With its advanced analytics and machine learning capabilities, Guardium Insights helps businesses safeguard critical data assets from unauthorized access, ensuring data integrity and reducing the risk of data breaches.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the IBM Security Guardium Insights server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Encoded Token
fields.name: encoded_token
fields.description:
Encoded Token received when creating a new API Key in IBM Security Guardium Insights.  

Refer to the IBM Guardium Insights documentation to Create API Keys 

Copy the Encoded token to use in this parameter. 

For more details, refer to the IBM Guardium Insights documentation at https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/guardium-insights/3.0.x?topic=administering-api-keys#settings_api.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the available report categories from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the report ID specified.
operations.title: Get Report Categories List

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of report to retrieve its categories list from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get report ID from the Get Reports List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of report to retrieve its categories list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the reports from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the category ID specified.
operations.title: Get Reports List

parameters.title: Category ID
parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Specify the category ID of report to retrieve the reports list from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get category ID from Get Report Categories List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the category ID of report to retrieve the reports list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the policies from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Policies List

operations.description: Retrieves the details of a policy from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the policy ID specified.
operations.title: Get Policy Details

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Specify the policy ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get the policy ID from the Get Policies List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the policy ID to retrieve its details from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the cases from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the case ID and other input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Cases List

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Specify the case ID to retrieve the cases list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID to retrieve the cases list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of cases that this operation should return from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of cases that this operation should return from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving the list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving the list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the tasks from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the case ID and the task ID specified.
operations.title: Get Tasks List

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Specify the case ID to retrieve all its linked tasks from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get Case ID from the Get Cases List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID to retrieve all its linked tasks from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: Specify the task ID to retrieve only the specified task from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the task ID to retrieve only the specified task from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the groups from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Groups List

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the members of the group from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the group ID specified.
operations.title: Get Group Members List

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Specify the group ID or a comma-separated list of group IDs to retrieve its members from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get group ID from the Get groups List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID or a comma-separated list of group IDs to retrieve its members from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the compliance data from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Compliance Data

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the accounts used for connections from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the account ID and the account access key specified.
operations.title: Get Connections List

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Specify the account ID to retrieve connections associated with the specified account from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account ID to retrieve connections associated with the specified account from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Account Access Key
parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Specify the account access key to retrieve connections associated with the specified access key from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account access key to retrieve connections associated with the specified access key from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the datasets from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the time period and other input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Datasets List

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: filter.start_time
parameters.description: Specify the start date and time of the duration within which the datasets were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date and time of the duration within which the datasets were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: filter.end_time
parameters.description: Specify the end date and time of the duration within which the datasets were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date and time of the duration within which the datasets were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of datasets that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of datasets that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the data report of specified dataset from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the dataset name and other input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Limit

parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the notifications from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the date range and other input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Notifications List

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: filter.start_time
parameters.description: Specify the start date and time of the duration within which the notifications were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date and time of the duration within which the notifications were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: filter.end_time
parameters.description: Specify the end date and time of the duration within which the notifications were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date and time of the duration within which the notifications were created to retrieve their list from IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: filter.state
parameters.tooltip: Specify the state of notifications to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. Default State is INCLUDE_ALL.
parameters.description:
Specify the state of notifications to retrieve from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can select from the following options:  

INCLUDE_ALL 

UNREAD_ONLY 

READ_ONLY 

COMPLETE_ONLY 

NOT_COMPLETE 

Default State is INCLUDE_ALL.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of notifications that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of notifications that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the details of the scheduled job from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the schedule ID specified.
operations.title: Get Scheduled Job Details

parameters.description: Specify the schedule ID to retrieve the details of the associated scheduled job from IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get schedule ID from the Get Schedules List action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the schedule ID to retrieve details of scheduled job from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
